Class DestroyBlocksPowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • DestroyBlocksPowerUp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Tokenizable

    public class DestroyBlocksPowerUp
extends Sprite
implements Tokenizable, java.io.Serializable
    This is the class representing Destroy All Blocks Power Up. This is a child of Sprite class and implements Tokenizable. It is also serializable. This power up destroy all the blocks on the screen when it intersects with the snake.
    Author:
    SHUBHAM THAKRAL, TANMAY BANSAL
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DestroyBlocksPowerUp(int[] screenCoordinates)
      In the constructor, we take screenCoordinates and pass it to the super class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action(Snake snake)
      This defines the action method of Tokenizable interface such that whenever snake intersects with it, all blocks can be destroyed.
      void update(double time)
      This defines the abstract method of Sprite class such that this is allowed to only move in Y direction.

        public DestroyBlocksPowerUp(int[] screenCoordinates)
        In the constructor, we take screenCoordinates and pass it to the super class constructor.
        Parameters:
        screenCoordinates - is an array of upper and lower bounds of the screen in XY plane. It is taken so that objects can know the boundaries of screen.
